sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( unq , title , name , userid , phone , email , person , type , money , floc , city , sdate , edate , schange , airline , passage , stay , stayname , req , ptime , rdate ) VALUES ( SEQ_estimate_unq.nextval , '$title$' , '$name$' , '$userid$' , '$phone$' , '$email$' , '$person$' , '$type$' , '$money$' , '$floc$' , '$city$' , '$sdate$' , '$edate$' , '$schange$' , '$airline$' , '$passage$' , '$stay$' , '$stayname$' , '$req$' , '$ptime$' , sysdate )
